error.signature: Error: useState/useEffect can only be used in Client Components
error.regex: (useState|useEffect|useContext).+can only be used in Client Components

verdict.summary: React hooks used in a Server Component. Next.js App Router defaults to Server Components.

dead_ends.action: Make the entire page a Client Component
dead_ends.why_fails: Loses server-side rendering benefits for the whole page

dead_ends.action: Pass hooks through props from a parent Client Component
dead_ends.why_fails: Hooks cannot be passed as props, they must be called in the component

workarounds.action: Add 'use client' directive at the top of the file that uses hooks
Extract the interactive part into a separate Client Component
